channel.title: How do you stop x log? please help
channel.description: how do i stop x log since alot of people are doing it to dupe items.... the source is pk planet and it is a 317 server please give me code so x log dosent work and makes them stay in game for 15 more seconds or something like that. tx

item.title: How do you stop x log? please help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[HELP]#### X - LOGGING / XLOGGERS ## Lets get it out of our community! %%%%%%%%

Don’t call the logout/destruct method when the client/browser is closed. Although, that would be pretty inefficient.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you stop x log? please help
